document_data.caption: A map showing Trident Avenue in south Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Trident Avenue
document_data.ends: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Trident Avenue''' was a road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Trident Avenue was located in south Zhentil Keep within the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]]. The road originated in the east near the waterfront and passed west for several blocks before ending at the wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]].
document_data.Notable Locations: A [[Zhentarim]] warehouse and barracks for the [[Zhentilar]] were located on Trident Avenue.
